arStrings.szText: Enemies in {c_important}Caltrops{/c} take {c_number}[SF_14 * SF_20 * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage from you, increased by {c_number}[{SF_14} * 100|%x|]{/c} each second.
You have {c_number}[{SF_18} * 100|%+|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance against enemies inside your {c_important}Caltrops{/c}. Double this amount against {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies.
{c_important}Caltrops{/c} now deals Cold damage and {c_important}{u}Chills{/u}{/c} enemies for {c_number}{SF_16}%{/c} per second.
